metadata.name: !~Pudding And Wakaba [REP/RGON/WIP]
metadata.description:
The various uncommon girls arrived to basement!
[h1][url=https://repentogon.com/]REPENTOGON[/url]/REPENTANCE ONLY! Does not work with Afterbirth+![/h1] [b]Requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Descriptions[/url][/b](English/Korean/Chinese compatible)
Mod Includes : [img]https://i.imgur.com/OQHAgwc.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7gwsfJ9.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/gVblMFh.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UJqMlrm.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1Fwrl3h.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wcCLH8g.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/oFjYytb.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/In7yTCH.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/YlrKb6R.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iskBGLc.png[/img]
11 Characters 80+ Items 15+ Trinkets 15+ Card/Runes 10+ Pills 20 Challenges
[h1]Items[/h1] [b]Under construction, Using Encyclopedia Wiki is strongly recommended. [/b]
[h1]Stackable Mantle[/h1] - Collecting multiple Holy Mantle items now allows to give corresponding amount of shields. - Blanket now also works on Dogma and The Beast fight! - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2613009134]Standalone version[/url]
[h1]Inventory Descriptions[/h1] - Press F5 to show current items you have. Pressing F5 again to exit list mode. - Also shows current curse descriptions. - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3255660204]Standalone version[/url]
[h1] More Notes [/h1] [list] [*] [b]Using with REPENTOGON is highly recommended.[/b] [*] [b]Like other mods, you MUST restart the game if you installed, enabled/disabled, or updated the mod.[/b] [*] Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362] Encyclopedia [/url] [*] Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787] Mod Config Menu - Pure [/url] (Mod Config Menu - Continued no longer works.) [*] Bonus Mega Mush costume requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2615720951]Mega Mush CostumeSuffix Compat[/url] [/list]
[h1] Special Thanks [/h1] - _Kilburn - Tearsup function - AgentCucco - Various code snippets, Achievement Papers, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2520695034]Damocles API[/url] - Mana - Item reroll function - meloonicscorp - Glitched item spawn function - Xalum (Retribution) - Major mechanics for custom rooms(for implementation for Tainted Richer planetariums), base format for custom callbacks - DeadInfinity - getting current dimension snippet - Zamiel, (+ NeoDement) - Isaacscript (+ for player identifier logic) - im_tem - Pseudo-Lilith Birtrhright position - Wofsauge - Pseudo-Dark Arts trails snippet - Cadaver: The Rotten Expansion - for implementation for Clover Chest - Connor - Hidden Item manager - bogdanrudyka - PostGetCollectible custom callback - NFrost - charge bar library - Benny(Sanio) - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2541362255]Character Costume Protector, HUD Helper[/url] library - YouDuckBoom - Chinese EID translation
